(2) Samson Agonistes -- U. of Chicago
Can't figure out how they can justify this as
"drama”. Sounds more like a bunch of members of
an English Department reading words without
regard for dramatic values and impact.
By truly dramatic standards, this is a ponderous,
amateurish presentation that doesn't anywhere near
do justice to Milton's powerful work.
